complete.title: Mark task as complete
complete.overdueInfo: This task is overdue. The next due date will be calculated from today {{intervalText}}.
complete.noteHint: This note will be saved and can be viewed later per plant in Plants Journal.
complete.notePlaceholder: You can add a short note about what you did, observations, etc.

completeBulk.title: Mark {{count}} tasks as complete
completeBulk.overdueInfo: Some tasks are overdue. For overdue tasks, the next due date will be calculated from today {{intervalText}}.
completeBulk.noteHint: This note will be saved for each completed task and can be viewed later per plant in Plants Journal.
